_comment: Default configuration values for Photo Processing Service
_description: These are the fallback values used when no other configuration is provided. Override via environment variables, config/settings.json, or runtime API.
_priority: Runtime API > config/settings.json > Environment Variables > THIS FILE

_notes.storage: All paths must be provided via environment variables (.env file)
_notes.database: All database connection details must be provided via environment variables (.env file)
_notes.compreface: All CompreFace URLs and API keys must be provided via environment variables (.env file)
_notes.processing: Granular confidence thresholds allow separate control for review vs auto-assignment workflows
_notes.confidence: Review thresholds (0.75) are lower than auto-assign (0.99) to give users control over automation
_notes.features: Admin API disabled by default for security

objectDetection.confidence.detection: Min confidence to detect and save objects to database
objectDetection.confidence.search: Min confidence to show objects in search results (more liberal)
objectDetection.confidence.highQuality: High confidence threshold for priority/featured objects
objectDetection.batchSize: Number of images to process simultaneously
objectDetection.imageResize: Resize images to these dimensions for object detection processing

faceDetection.confidence.detection: CompreFace API threshold for detecting faces in images
faceDetection.confidence.review: Min confidence to show detected faces in manual review queue
faceDetection.confidence.autoAssign: Min confidence to automatically assign faces without human review

faceRecognition.confidence.review: Show potential face matches for manual review at this confidence
faceRecognition.confidence.autoAssign: Auto-assign face to person without human review at this confidence
faceRecognition.confidence.similarity: Min similarity score to consider faces as potential matches
faceRecognition.workflow.enableAutoAssignment: Allow automatic face assignment to people
faceRecognition.workflow.enableReviewQueue: Show medium-confidence matches for manual review
faceRecognition.workflow.maxReviewQueueSize: Maximum number of items in manual review queue

screenshotDetection.threshold: Score threshold (0-100) for classifying images as screenshots

compreface.apiKey: Optional global API key for CompreFace service
compreface.detectApiKey: Optional API key specifically for face detection
compreface.recognizeApiKey: Optional API key specifically for face recognition
compreface.timeout: Request timeout in milliseconds for CompreFace API calls
compreface.maxConcurrency: Maximum number of concurrent requests to CompreFace

server.galleryPageSize: Number of items per page in gallery views
server.searchLimit: Maximum number of search results to return
server.scanBatchSize: Number of photos to process simultaneously during scanning

features.enableApiConfig: Enable admin panel API for runtime configuration changes
